title: API layer MVP — thin FastAPI wrapper around bd (read + write)
description:
Build os/bin/os-api — a thin REST API wrapping bd. Spec: 3dl/docs/atom-architecture-state-api.md. Architecture: os/docs/architecture.md.

Phase 1 (read-only):
- GET /beads — list beads (supports --json filters, cross-project via config)
- GET /beads/:id — show bead details
- GET /artifacts/:path — read markdown artifacts from project repos
- GET /projects — list registered projects and status

Phase 2 (write):
- POST /beads — create bead
- PATCH /beads/:id — update bead (status, description, labels)
- POST /beads/:id/close — close with reason
- POST /beads/:id/comment — add comment

Implementation: Python, FastAPI, shells out to bd for every operation (no direct SQLite). Single file at os/bin/os-api or os/api/main.py. Dockerized. Config reads from os.yml (project registry). Auth: static bearer token for MVP (single user behind Tailscale).

Requested by: 3dl/3dl-7qu
close_reason:
API layer MVP complete. Deliverables:
- api/main.py: FastAPI server (8 endpoints) — list/show beads, deps, comments, artifacts, projects (read); create/update/close beads, add comments (write). Shells out to bd --no-db for every operation. Cross-project via project query param + projects.yml registry. Bearer token auth.
- api/projects.yml: project registry (os, 3dl, website, mag-shield, galtrader, vms)
- docker/Dockerfile.api: Alpine + Python + bd + FastAPI
- docker/docker-compose.yml: api service added (mounts /projects, exposes port 3131)
- bin/atom-api: wrapper script (start/stop/logs/restart/status)
All endpoints tested: health, projects, beads CRUD, cross-project reads, artifacts, comments.
